scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html style.css main.js dist/ && cd cryptograms && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ../dist/cryptograms && cp -r dist/* ../dist/cryptograms/ && cd ../anxiety3 && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ../dist/anxiety3 && cp -r dist/* ../dist/anxiety3/ && cd .. && mkdir -p dist/hexenergy && cp -r hexenergy/* dist/hexenergy/
